threads: The real healthcare crisis isn't the cost, it's the government interference. Free market solutions, not price controls or single-payer systems, will bring affordability and quality care to all.
text: @alt_right, really? So the millions without coverage are just choosing to live without healthcare? Free market's magic will fix that?   You're assuming everyone can afford healthcare in a free market. That's a fallacy. We need gov't intervention to ensure access for all.
